title: What Is Persona 5 S? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.02.19
description:
Order your 23andMe Health + Ancestry Service kit at http://23andme.com/games

The first 500 people to sign up will receive a 2 month free trial. Go to https://skl.sh/kindafunnygamesdaily3 to start your trial now.

Steven Brown -- AKA Capitalist Pig -- joins Greg to talk about a teaser site for Persona 5 S and Jason Schrier's "How BioWare's Anthem Went Wrong" article. 

Time Stamps - 
00:05:22 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:06:23 - WTF is Persona 5S?!
00:13:31 - Cyberpunk 2077’s Only Game Over is if you Die
00:22:04 - AC3 Pulled from PC Stores
00:28:35 - No More Heroes News at E3?
00:30:06 - Out today
00:32:04 -  23&Me
00:33:20 -  Skillshare
Reader mail   -
00:34:45 - “With Sekiro released as the most recent of the super-difficult games, the discussion point continues to come up surrounding the inclusion of an Easy Mode...” - Rj J
00:47:16 - Squad Up: Mike Mangiarelli - Xbox One - mikeymang7557
00:48:31 - Required Reading - https://kotaku.com/how-biowares-anthem-went-wrong-1833731964
00:51:55 - “Do you think BioWare will try to do anything to make nice or to get out in front of anything else?” - Randy Brunet
00:59:42 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s host: Fran & Whitta
